sentences.sContent: It’s an interesting job. The only snag is that it’s not very well paid.
sentences.sCn: 这是一份有趣的工作，唯一的缺憾是工资不高。

synos.tran: 抓住机会；造成阻碍；清除障碍物

trans.tranOther: a problem or disadvantage, especially one that is not very serious, which you had not expected

trans.tranCn: 抓住机会；造成阻碍；清除障碍物
